```{r}
z <- 5
set.seed(1)
while(z >= 4 && z <= 11) {
        coin <- rbinom(2, 2, 1)
        
        if(coin == 2) {  ## random walk
                z <- z + 2
        } else {
                z <- z - 2
        } 
}
print(z)
```

```{r}
f <- function(num) {
        hello <- "Happy Halloween!\n"
         for(i in seq_len(num)) {
                 cat(hello)
       }
        chars <- nchar(hello) * num
        chars
 }
 meaningoflife <- f(2)
 print(meaningoflife)
```

```{r}
f()
```

```{r}
f <- function(num = 1) {
        hello <- "Scary skeleton!\n"
         for(i in seq_len(num)) {
                 cat(hello)
         }
         chars <- nchar(hello) * num
         chars
 }

f(2)
```
